languages.text: "Не делайте вид, что не знаете. Денз, скотина, оставил вам все свои — немалые! — денежки. Не знаю, почему, и знать не хочу, но мне кажется, что это было очень, очень скверно с его стороны — забыть старого друга. Вот ничего мне не остается, кроме как побороться за справедливость! Потому вы тихо-мирно посидите под замком, пока я потолкую насчет своей доли в наследстве. Да ведь?"

traits.locale_text: "Не делайте вид, что не знаете. Денз, скотина, оставил вам все свои — немалые! — денежки. Не знаю, почему, и знать не хочу, но мне кажется, что это было очень, очень скверно с его стороны — забыть старого друга. Вот ничего мне не остается, кроме как побороться за справедливость! Потому вы тихо-мирно посидите под замком, пока я потолкую насчет своей доли в наследстве. Да ведь?"

languages.text: "Don't play dumb. Denz, the weasel, left all his money to you — a whole lotta money! I don't know why and I don't want to know, but I think it was very, very wrong of him to forget his old friend. I've got no choice but to fight for justice! So you're going to sit quietly under lock and key while I discuss my share of the inheritance. Isn't that right?"
languages.original_text: "Не делайте вид, что не знаете. Денз, скотина, оставил вам все свои — немалые! — денежки. Не знаю, почему, и знать не хочу, но мне кажется, что это было очень, очень скверно с его стороны — забыть старого друга. Вот ничего мне не остается, кроме как побороться за справедливость! Потому вы тихо-мирно посидите под замком, пока я потолкую насчет своей доли в наследстве. Да ведь?"

traits.locale_text: "Don't play dumb. Denz, the weasel, left all his money to you — and a lot of it! I don't know why and I don't want to know, but I think it was very, very wrong of him to forget his old friend. I've got no choice but to fight for justice! So you're going to sit quietly under lock and key while I'm discussing my share of the inheritance. Aren't you?"

"Don't play dumb. Denz, the weasel, left all his money to you — and a lot of it! I don't know why and I don't want to know, but I think it was very, very wrong of him to forget his old friend. I've got no choice but to fight for justice! So you're going to sit quietly under lock and key while I'm discussing my share of the inheritance. Aren't you?"

"Don't play dumb. Denz, the weasel, left all his money to you — a whole lotta money! I don't know why and I don't want to know, but I think it was very, very wrong of him to forget his old friend. I've got no choice but to fight for justice! So you're going to sit quietly under lock and key while I discuss my share of the inheritance. Isn't that right?"

"Don't play dumb. Denz, the weasel, left all his money to you — a whole lotta money! I don't know why and I don't want to know, but I think it was very, very wrong of him to forget his old friend. I've got no choice but to fight for justice! So you're going to sit quietly under lock and key while I discuss my share of the inheritance. Isn't that right?"

"Don't play dumb. Denz, the weasel, left all his money to you — a whole lotta money! I don't know why and I don't want to know, but I think it was very, very wrong of him to forget his old friend. I've got no choice but to fight for justice! So you're going to sit quietly under lock and key while I discuss my share of the inheritance. Isn't that right?"

languages.text: “别装傻了。丹兹这条老狐狸，他把所有的钱都留给了你——一大笔钱！我不知道他为什么要这么干，我也不想知道。但我觉得，他忘记了他的老朋友，这真的很不地道！太不地道了！所以我别无选择，只能为了公道而战！所以，在我讨论我应得的那份遗产时，你最好老老实实地给我呆着。你说呢？”
languages.original_text: "Don't play dumb. Denz, the weasel, left all his money to you — a whole lotta money! I don't know why and I don't want to know, but I think it was very, very wrong of him to forget his old friend. I've got no choice but to fight for justice! So you're going to sit quietly under lock and key while I discuss my share of the inheritance. Isn't that right?"

traits.locale_text: “别装傻了。丹兹这条老狐狸，他把所有的钱都留给了你——一大笔钱！我不知道他为什么要这么干，我也不想知道。但我觉得，他忘记了他的老朋友，这真的很不地道！太不地道了！所以我别无选择，只能为了公道而战！所以，在我讨论我应得的那份遗产时，你最好老老实实地给我呆着。你说呢？”

languages.text: «No te hagas {mf|el tonto|la tonta}. Esa comadreja de Denz te dejó todo su dinero. Ni sé por qué ni quiero saberlo, pero está muy, muy feo que se olvidara de su viejo amigo. ¡Tengo que luchar para que se haga justicia! Así que te vas a esperar un ratito bajo llave mientras hablo de mi parte de la herencia. ¿Entendido?».
languages.original_text: "Don't play dumb. Denz, the weasel, left all his money to you — a whole lotta money! I don't know why and I don't want to know, but I think it was very, very wrong of him to forget his old friend. I've got no choice but to fight for justice! So you're going to sit quietly under lock and key while I discuss my share of the inheritance. Isn't that right?"

traits.locale_text: «No te hagas {mf|el tonto|la tonta}. Esa comadreja de Denz te dejó todo su dinero. Ni sé por qué ni quiero saberlo, pero está muy, muy feo que se olvidara de su viejo amigo. ¡Tengo que luchar para que se haga justicia! Así que te vas a esperar un ratito bajo llave mientras hablo de mi parte de la herencia. ¿Entendido?».

languages.text: 「しらを切っても無駄だ。デンツのクソ野郎は全財産をあんたに残した。とんでもない大金だ！なんでそうなったのか知らないし知りたくもないが、俺という大親友がいながらよそ者に渡すなんて酷い仕打ちじゃないか。俺は正義のために戦う！だから、遺産の分け前について話をつけている間に、あんたには静かにしていてもらうよ。いいだろう？」
languages.original_text: "Don't play dumb. Denz, the weasel, left all his money to you — a whole lotta money! I don't know why and I don't want to know, but I think it was very, very wrong of him to forget his old friend. I've got no choice but to fight for justice! So you're going to sit quietly under lock and key while I discuss my share of the inheritance. Isn't that right?"

traits.locale_text: 「しらを切っても無駄だ。デンツのクソ野郎は全財産をあんたに残した。とんでもない大金だ！なんでそうなったのか知らないし知りたくもないが、俺という大親友がいながらよそ者に渡すなんて酷い仕打ちじゃないか。俺は正義のために戦う！だから、遺産の分け前について話をつけている間に、あんたには静かにしていてもらうよ。いいだろう？」

languages.text: "Stellt Euch nicht dumm. Denz, dieses Wiesel, hat Euch sein ganzes Geld vermacht – sehr viel Geld! Ich weiß nicht, warum, und will es auch nicht wissen, aber ich halte es für einen großen Fehler von ihm, seinen alten Freund zu vergessen. Ich habe keine andere Wahl, als um Gerechtigkeit zu kämpfen! Also werdet Ihr friedlich eingesperrt sein, während ich über meinen Anteil der Erbschaft verhandle. Ist es nicht so?"
languages.original_text: "Don't play dumb. Denz, the weasel, left all his money to you — a whole lotta money! I don't know why and I don't want to know, but I think it was very, very wrong of him to forget his old friend. I've got no choice but to fight for justice! So you're going to sit quietly under lock and key while I discuss my share of the inheritance. Isn't that right?"

traits.locale_text: "Stellt Euch nicht dumm. Denz, dieses Wiesel, hat Euch sein ganzes Geld vermacht – sehr viel Geld! Ich weiß nicht, warum, und will es auch nicht wissen, aber ich halte es für einen großen Fehler von ihm, seinen alten Freund zu vergessen. Ich habe keine andere Wahl, als um Gerechtigkeit zu kämpfen! Also werdet Ihr friedlich eingesperrt sein, während ich über meinen Anteil der Erbschaft verhandle. Ist es nicht so?"

languages.text: « Inutile de faire l'{mf|innocent|innocente}. Cette raclure de Denz vous a légué tout son argent, et ça fait un sacré paquet ! Je ne sais pas pourquoi, et franchement, je ne veux pas le savoir, mais ce n'était pas sympa de sa part d'oublier son plus vieil ami. Je n'ai pas d'autre choix que de réclamer justice par la force ! Alors vous allez vous asseoir bien gentiment dans un coin pendant que je réclame ma part de l'héritage. Compris ? »
languages.original_text: "Don't play dumb. Denz, the weasel, left all his money to you — a whole lotta money! I don't know why and I don't want to know, but I think it was very, very wrong of him to forget his old friend. I've got no choice but to fight for justice! So you're going to sit quietly under lock and key while I discuss my share of the inheritance. Isn't that right?"

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de faire l'{mf|innocent|innocente}. Cette raclure de Denz vous a légué tout son argent, et ça fait un sacré paquet ! Je ne sais pas pourquoi, et franchement, je ne veux pas le savoir, mais ce n'était pas sympa de sa part d'oublier son plus vieil ami. Je n'ai pas d'autre choix que de réclamer justice par la force ! Alors vous allez vous asseoir bien gentiment dans un coin pendant que je réclame ma part de l'héritage. Compris ? »

languages.text: "Salağa yatmayın. Çakal Denz, tüm parasını size bıraktı. Az buz para da değil! Nedenini bilmiyorum, bilmek de istemiyorum ama bence eski dostunu bir kalemde silmesi hiç doğru değildi. Adalet için savaşmaktan başka çarem yok! O yüzden ben mirastaki hakkımı savunurken siz de kilit altında uslu uslu oturacaksınız. Anlaşıldı mı?"
languages.original_text: "Don't play dumb. Denz, the weasel, left all his money to you — a whole lotta money! I don't know why and I don't want to know, but I think it was very, very wrong of him to forget his old friend. I've got no choice but to fight for justice! So you're going to sit quietly under lock and key while I discuss my share of the inheritance. Isn't that right?"

traits.locale_text: "Salağa yatma. Kurnaz Denz, tüm parasını sana bıraktı. Az buz para da değil! Nedenini bilmiyorum, bilmek de istemiyorum ama bence eski dostunu bir kalemde silmesi hiç doğru değildi. Adalet için savaşmaktan başka şansım yok! O yüzden ben miras hakkımı tartışırken siz de kilit altında uslu uslu oturacaksınız. Anlaşıldı mı?"
